    • Constructor Detail

      • DominoInt

        public DominoInt(java.lang.Integer leftValue,
                 java.lang.Integer rightValue)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 tools.InvariantBrokenException
        Class constructor. Construct a domino from a given left and right values. Check if the class invariant was not broken.
        Parameters:
        leftValue - the first value of the piece.
        rightValue - the second value of the piece.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when leftValue or rightValue are out range MIN .. MAX.
        tools.InvariantBrokenException - if the domino state is not valid after execution.

    • Method Detail

      • getLeftValue

        public int getLeftValue()
        Retrieve the left value of the domino piece. Implement the method InterfaceDomino.getLeftValue() in order to use the graphical interface. The left value corresponds to GenericPair.first.
        Specified by:
        getLeftValue in interface graphicInterface.InterfaceDomino
        Returns:
        the left value of the piece.

      • getRightValue

        public int getRightValue()
        Implement the method InterfaceDomino.getRightValue() in order to use the graphical interface. The left value corresponds to GenericPair.second.
        Specified by:
        getRightValue in interface graphicInterface.InterfaceDomino
        Returns:
        the right value of the piece.

      • invariant

        public boolean invariant()
        Check that the left and right values are in allowed range MIN .. MAX.
        Returns:
        True if the domino is in a valid state. False otherwise.

      • setFirst

        public void setFirst(java.lang.Object obj)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set the left value of the Domino. Override GenericPair.setFirst(Object) method to handle exceptions.
        Specified by:
        setFirst in interface generics.abstractions.PairSpecification
        Overrides:
        setFirst in class generics.templates.GenericPair
        Parameters:
        obj - Object assign to the left value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if obj is null, is not an Integer or is out of the range MIN .. MAX.
